channel.title: Anti lagging
channel.description: Hi, I'm working on my server source, but it is quite laggy. I know iknow, i looked on theforums, but i also checked lots of things. For example, i have the anti lagg file from mod tahorok, but it still lagss with only me logged in alone! I really don't know what to do to stop it! Any help? THanks RS CHamp2 P.S:The lagg is,when i walk around . The animation of walking lags and turning the sight of my player(so changing the view)laggs too. Something is majorly wrong.

item.title: Anti lagging
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

yep everyone who had an account with the old (gooddd!) berlinscape, lost their account for that time, but also couldnt connect cause my server went down.
BUT u could help me, by finding a host! Then berlinscape would be back up i promise.
Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Anti lagging
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Hi,
I’m working on my server source, but it is quite laggy. I know iknow, i looked on theforums, but i also checked lots of things. For example, i have the anti lagg file from mod tahorok, but it still lagss with only me logged in alone!
I really don’t know what to do to stop it!
Any help?
THanks
RS CHamp2
P.S:The lagg is,when i walk around . The animation of walking lags and turning the sight of my player(so changing the view)laggs too. Something is majorly wrong.

Read full topic
